info.title: Persons
info.description: Persons Resource of the University API

get.description: Returns a collection of Persons

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: The text to search for in the specified context.

parameters.name: addresses.address_lines
parameters.description: Comma separated (URI Encode commas in address), case insensitive, Wildcard (*) accepted and auto appended. Do not use address lines from different addresses.

parameters.name: addresses.country_code
parameters.description: Case insensitive filter of address country code.

parameters.name: addresses.city
parameters.description: Case insensitive, wildcard (*) accepted and auto appended.

parameters.name: credentials.credential_type
parameters.description: The type of credential being looked up

parameters.name: credentials.user_names
parameters.description: The user name belonging to the credential type

parameters.name: email_addresses.email_address
parameters.description: The person's PERSONAL email address. A case-insensitive search is performed.  A wildcard character is automatically appended.

parameters.name: email_aliases.email_alias
parameters.description: The person's email alias. A case-insensitive search is performed.  A wildcard character is automatically appended.

parameters.name: phones.phone_numbers
parameters.description: The person's phone number.  A numerics-only search is performed. Search multiple numbers separated by commas

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: The person's surname.  A case-insensitive search is performed.  You may insert '*' wildcards anywhere in the string, and a wildcard character is automatically appended.

parameters.name: rest_of_name
parameters.description: The person's given names.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: preferred_surname
parameters.description: The person's preferred surname.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: preferred_first_name
parameters.description: The person's preferred first name.  A case-insensitive search is performed.

parameters.name: personal_record.religion_code
parameters.description: The person's religion, validated through the meta/religion service

parameters.name: personal_record.citizenship_country_code
parameters.description: The person's citizenship, validated through the meta/country service

parameters.name: home_state_code
parameters.description: The person's home state, validated through the meta/state service

parameters.name: home_country_code
parameters.description: The person's home country code, validated through the meta/country service

parameters.name: personal_record.visa_type
parameters.description: The person's visa type, validated through the meta/visa_type service

parameters.name: employee_summary.employee_role
parameters.description: The person's employee type in XXX-XX-XXX format. (See the meta/employee_role service)

parameters.name: student_summary.student_status
parameters.description: The person's student status.  Provided by Student Status Info service

parameters.name: group_memberships.group_ids
parameters.description: Returns a collection of people who are members of group_id. Group ID must match exactly

parameters.name: groups_administered.group_id
parameters.description: Returns a collection of people who are administrators of group_id. Group ID must match exactly

parameters.name: field_sets
parameters.description: indicates which field sets are to be returned

parameters.name: contexts
parameters.description: indicates which contexts are to be returned

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: Which page to start on, Must be greater than 0

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Size of the collection returned, Must be greater than 0

200.description: A collection of Persons successfully returned

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of persons

persons__info.description: Hypermedia link for the default persons collection

persons__first.description: Hypermedia link for the persons collection at the first page

person_lookup.description: Be sure to URL Encode, Accepts wild cards (*,?,%,_), @ symbol at beginning for email (@cosmo_cougar), one name = surname + preferred_surname, two names = sort_name + preferred_name, three names = sort_name, suffix and title ignored
